question: Will Aryna Sabalenka win the 2025 Women's Madrid Open?
description:
The market will resolve to “Yes” if Aryna Sabalenka wins the 2025 Mutua Madrid Open Womens Singles Tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If at any point it becomes impossible for this player to win the Madrid Open Womens Tournament per the rules of the Madrid Open, this market will resolve to “No”.

If the 2025 Madrid Open is permanently canceled or has not been completed by July 6, 2025, 11:59 PM, this market will resolve to “Other”.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the Madrid Open (https://mutuamadridopen.com/en/), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: LEC: G2 vs. Fnatic
description:
G2 and Fnatic are scheduled to play each other in a regular season matchup of the League of Legends EMEA Championship on April 27, 2025, at 9:00 AM ET.

This market will resolve to “G2” if G2 wins against Fnatic in the best of 3, week 5 matchup of the League of Legends EMEA Championship league.

This market will resolve to “Fnatic” if Fnatic wins against G2 in the best of 3, week 5 matchup of the League of Legends EMEA Championship league.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond May 28, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/leagues/lec).
